forums.name: Metal Discussion
forums.desc: A space for open conversations covering various topics related to music, providing a platform for sharing opinions, ideas, and experiences within the community.

forums.name: Events
forums.desc: An area dedicated to the promotion of calendared music-related events in Newfoundland, including concerts, festivals, workshops, and gatherings.

forums.name: Local Music Artists
forums.desc: Dedicated to showcasing the musicians from the local music scene, fostering support and recognition within the community.

forums.name: New Releases and Promotions
forums.desc: A forum highlighting the latest music releases, promotional activities from the local talents.
